data.description:
# EarthQuest - Changelog v12-13

Greetings, fellow explorers!

I, Bowie (also known as Electrum), am thrilled to present a monumental update that embodies 13 days and nights of relentless dedication and hard work. EarthQuest's version 12 and version 13 is more than just an update; it's a testament to what unwavering determination can achieve.


### Clearing the Path
- This update is so substantial that I had to remove previous changelogs from the main page to make space for the sheer magnitude of changes.

### Street View Integration
I'm thrilled to also introduce the integration of Google Street View into EarthQuest, taking your exploration to a whole new level.

### Single Player Mode
- I've implemented a Single Player mode to provide a quality-focused solo experience.
- It's optimized for smoother gameplay and features a refreshed user interface (UI).

### Hub for Play Modes

- The new UI now includes a hub where you can seamlessly switch between Play Modes, whether you want to explore solo or join others in multiplayer adventures.

### Room Management

- Players can now easily create or join rooms with room codes.
- Clear error messages guide you when there's no internet, servers are down, or no room code is provided.

changelog.change_log:
Some code optimizations now allows 2 WHOLE NEW LEVELS of Terrain Quality Range ! ( yeah.. i said "Terrain Quality Range" ... no more "Mesh Quality Range" )
That doesn't mean it's going to run as well as on 75% for example, but not to worry since i've now added Performance Warnings !
Added Song Repeat Option !
Better, Reworked More Natural Automatic (height based) flight speed !
No more abrupt flight movements !
Each Button Press Now HAS To be in view in order to register as a press, soo.. no more accidental presses !
Better Microphone Clarity When Talking to AI !! (Better Voice Transcription)
Rewritten AI Info Instruction. (might give better responses but we'll have to wait and see for sure)

and fixed other small imperfections..
also renamed "Simultaneous Tile Loads" to "Terrain Loading Speed"

v17:
Here's what's new:

1. AI Integration:
here's its capabilities:

-Knows Everything About EarthQuest
-Can Transcribe, Hear and Talk in 99 Languages
-Can See Your Sorroundings, City, and Country You're in Precisely and Give Information about it, if Asked.
-Can Recommend New Places and Teleport you Directly There.
-Can Translate, Explain and Help With the User Interface.
-Can Redirect You to the Discord Community.
-Can Remember your Previous Messages in the Conversation.

this allows the AI to help people navigate the user interface or even specify which button to press and what each button on the menu does, or how to find the discord server, and even recommend playing the Multiplayer Mode with your Friends.

the AI Companion also has control over the Game, On day one, it will be Perfectly Stable and Capable on the following:

 \*Seeing the Environment the Player is in:
EarthQuest identifies that Vision is necessary,
sends it to gpt-4 to generate a short description of whatever monument or landmark the player is reffering to,
and Sends that description to the Main (info-based) AI to respond to the Player naturally.
if no Landmark is identified, the Address of the current VR Earth Location will be Sent to the info-based AI.

\*Automatically types a suggested place, or the preferred place (prompted by you) on the Search For Place Keyboard and teleports you there automatically!

\*Understand, Write and Speak in 99 different Languages.
2. Potential Crash fix on Multiplayer Mode,
still investigating to see if it still occurs.
3. Multiplayer Uniquely Detailed Avatars (in EarthQuest Style).
4. Hand Tracking Rotation Speed is now Consistent across all Player Sizes
5. Option to Remap Right Controller's Flight Button in the Hub Menu.
6. Show Location Preview (current location address in sky) is no longer JUST in front of the player, Now the Address is shown in all directions, to prevent the Address being behind the Player View (Which Happened when the centered VR space was backwards due to movement and not re-centered).
7. Fixed Rendering Issue on the Controller Street View bubble, Now it really feels like a magic Portal into the Street View World.
8. Prevent Creating a Multiplayer Room with the same name as an already existing one by showing an error in the hub menu when pressing "Create Room"
9. Better Color Configuration across all Menus, including Hub, Text, Tutorial, Instructions, Key Setup, and Search For Place Keyboard.
10. Noticeable Performance Improvement due to almost every code optimized.
11. Increased Singleplayer Terrain Memory, which allows more Tiles to be at Full Quality at once, with NO Performance Cost.
12. Fixed 'How to Play' Menu not showing up in Singleplayer mode, and added more instructions.
13. Player 2 text above second user's head Position Fix
14. Multiplayer Head Rotation Synchronization, Which allows the Players to make Head Gestures and Seeing where the Player is looking at.
15. Being able to see the Second Player from Space when they're on Earth with Scale Accuracy.
and
seeing the Second Player from Earth when they're in Space with Scale Accuracy.
16. Made the Left Controller & Menu Invisible When in Controller Mode Street View.
17. Re-entering Street View at the same Place as the previous Street View Panorama will no longer process, therefore less data consumption and better performance inside Street View.
------------
v17.37:
Now able to fly backwards if the flight input is thumbstick.
Wind Volume Slightly lowered.
Very low Music Volume when Talking to AI.
Divide Preview tokens by 2, so it only goes down by 1.
v17.40:
Perfected AI.
Polished, Reformulated the API Key Setup - Instructions.
Now Able to Fly Left/Right with the Left Controller Joystick without rotating if the Input Flight button is "Thumbstick"
v17.44:
Fixed AI Teleporting in the right country but not city.
v17.52:
Added In App Purchase FOR AI !!! Now the token limit is WAYY Higher.
Fixed Seeing Street View Controller Bubble inside Street View while playing with Controllers.
Fixed AI Teleporting to Previous Places.
Fixed AI not Writing Information about the Place the User's been Teleported to.
v17.53:
Added Rotation and Flight Speed Acceleration based on Button Pressure.
v17.61:
Small UI and Code Adjustments.
Rotated Street View Bubble to a more appropriate Rotation.
Added EQ Icon on Controllers for a more pleasant look.
v17.62:
Starts in the location you left the game from.
v17.65:
Fixed AI Teleportation Gamebreaking issue.

-Can See Your Sorroundings, City, and Country You're in Precisely and Give Information about it, if Asked.
-Can Recommend New Places and Teleport you Directly There.
-Can Translate, Explain and Help With the User Interface.
-Can Redirect You to the Discord Community.
-Can Remember your Previous Messages in the Conversation.

this allows the AI to help people navigate the user interface or even specify which button to press and what each button on the menu does, or how to find the discord server, and even recommend playing the Multiplayer Mode with your Friends.

the AI Companion also has control over the Game, On day one, it will be Perfectly Stable and Capable on the following:

 \*Seeing the Environment the Player is in:
EarthQuest identifies that Vision is necessary,
sends it to gpt-4 to generate a short description of whatever monument or landmark the player is reffering to,
and Sends that description to the Main (info-based) AI to respond to the Player naturally.
if no Landmark is identified, the Address of the current VR Earth Location will be Sent to the info-based AI.

\*Automatically types a suggested place, or the preferred place (prompted by you) on the Search For Place Keyboard and teleports you there automatically!

\*Understand, Write and Speak in 99 different Languages.
2. Potential Crash fix on Multiplayer Mode,
still investigating to see if it still occurs.
3. Multiplayer Uniquely Detailed Avatars (in EarthQuest Style).
4. Hand Tracking Rotation Speed is now Consistent across all Player Sizes
5. Option to Remap Right Controller's Flight Button in the Hub Menu.
6. Show Location Preview (current location address in sky) is no longer JUST in front of the player, Now the Address is shown in all directions, to prevent the Address being behind the Player View (Which Happened when the centered VR space was backwards due to movement and not re-centered).
7. Fixed Rendering Issue on the Controller Street View bubble, Now it really feels like a magic Portal into the Street View World.
8. Prevent Creating a Multiplayer Room with the same name as an already existing one by showing an error in the hub menu when pressing "Create Room"
9. Better Color Configuration across all Menus, including Hub, Text, Tutorial, Instructions, Key Setup, and Search For Place Keyboard.
10. Noticeable Performance Improvement due to almost every code optimized.
11. Increased Singleplayer Terrain Memory, which allows more Tiles to be at Full Quality at once, with NO Performance Cost.
12. Fixed 'How to Play' Menu not showing up in Singleplayer mode, and added more instructions.
13. Player 2 text above second user's head Position Fix
14. Multiplayer Head Rotation Synchronization, Which allows the Players to make Head Gestures and Seeing where the Player is looking at.
15. Being able to see the Second Player from Space when they're on Earth with Scale Accuracy.
and
seeing the Second Player from Earth when they're in Space with Scale Accuracy.
16. Made the Left Controller & Menu Invisible When in Controller Mode Street View.
17. Re-entering Street View at the same Place as the previous Street View Panorama will no longer process, therefore less data consumption and better performance inside Street View.
